name: Princess and Phantom
description:
Princess and Phantom: Off the Rails is a low-poly 3D action-adventure game where the player, Princess, and her anthropomorphic vehicle companion, Phantom, journey far and wide collecting vehicle upgrades to enter the Wizard’s castle and save the Prince.

This is a 3-week rapid prototype made by students.

Controls:
WASD - Drive
SPACE - Jump
1,2,3,4 - Swap vehicles
ESC - Menu
R - Restart from checkpoint

The Team:
Jackson Symss
Programming Lead

Josh Ayala
Narrative Lead

Nora Luck-Jennings
Project and QA Lead

TJ Gregg
Art Lead
